choicedata 0.1.0

Package index

Data helpers

Functions that help to work with choice data.

choice_covariates() generate_choice_covariates() covariate_names() design_matrices()
Define choice covariates
choice_data() generate_choice_data() long_to_wide() wide_to_long()
Define choice data
choice_identifiers() generate_choice_identifiers() extract_choice_identifiers()
Define choice identifiers
choice_responses() generate_choice_responses()
Define choice response

Data sets

Choice data sets contained in the package.

train_choice
Stated Preferences for Train Traveling
travel_mode_choice
Revealed Preferences for Travel Mode Choice

Model specification

Functions to define a choice model.

choice_alternatives() print(<choice_alternatives>)
Define choice alternatives
choice_effects() print(<choice_effects>)
Define choice model effects
choice_formula() print(<choice_formula>)
Define choice model formula
choice_parameters() generate_choice_parameters() validate_choice_parameters() switch_parameter_space()
Define choice model parameters
choice_preferences() generate_choice_preferences()
Define choice preferences
compute_P() compute_P_d() compute_P_r()
Number of model effects

Choice probabilities

Functions to calculate choice probabilities and model likelihoods.

choice_likelihood() compute_choice_likelihood()
Define and compute choice likelihood
choice_probabilities() compute_choice_probabilities()
Define choice probabilities
choiceprob_logit()
Calculate logit choice probabilities
choiceprob_probit() choiceprob_mnp() choiceprob_mnp_ordered() choiceprob_mmnp() choiceprob_mmnp_ordered() choiceprob_mmnp_lc() choiceprob_mmnp_ordered_lc() choiceprob_mmnp_panel() choiceprob_mmnp_ordered_panel() choiceprob_mmnp_panel_lc() choiceprob_mmnp_ordered_panel_lc()
Calculate probit choice probabilities
